name: CharacterSheets Level
details: A Hats Protocol eligibility module that checks players for CharacterSheets characters with a minimum level for specific classes.

immutable.name: Classes Address
immutable.description: The address for the Classes token used in the character sheets game

immutable.name: CharacterSheets Address
immutable.description: The address for the CharacterSheets game where players have characters.

mutable.name: Class IDs
mutable.description: Initial classes to be included for eligibility

mutable.name: Minimum Levels
mutable.description: Initial levels needed for each class to be included for eligibility
